song.eTitle: THE HEAVENS DECLARE THE GLORY OF GOD -- Psalm 19, NJV

verses.verse: There is no speech or language where their voice is not heard. Their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world.
In the heavens he has pitched a tent for the sun, which is like a bridegroom coming forth from his pavilion, like a champion rejoicing to run his course.
The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.
